sense.def:
Z izrazom
glued
povemo, da je ena stvar trdno pripeta na drugo.

seg.quote: ...a chop glued to the plate by a thick sauce.

sense.def:
To be glued to the television or radio
pomeni namenjati vso pozornost televiziji ali radiu.

Kadar so človekove oči
glued to a particular thing
, določeno stvar gleda z vso pozornostjo.

seg.quote: Their eyes were glued to the scene below.
